availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p:
Marshall County, Kentucky, housewife. Indiana native. Married Jesse D. W. Page. Mother of
Celia J. Page, Lydia J. Page, Martha Page, Ellen W. Page, Lilbern Page, and Louis A. Page.
Married James H. Marshall in Benton, Kentucky, on July 11, 1855. Mother of L. P. C. Marshall and C. M. Marshall. Housewife in Marshall County in 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marshall County, p. 470 B; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marshall County, Olive post office, p. 89; Marshall County (Kentucky), Marriage Records, 1842-1953, vols. 3-4 1854-1863, accessed via FamilySearch.
